data.name: TestConstraintFKTree1
data.value:
USE TestConstraintFKTree1 GO
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Tabla2] DROP CONSTRAINT [FK_Tabla2_Tabla3] GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Tabla4] DROP CONSTRAINT [FK_Tabla4_Tabla2] GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Table7] DROP CONSTRAINT [FK_Table7_Tabla2] GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Tabla5] DROP CONSTRAINT [FK_Tabla5_Tabla6] GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Tabla1] DROP CONSTRAINT [FK_Tabla1_Tabla2] GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Tabla4] DROP CONSTRAINT [FK_Tabla4_Tabla1] GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Table7] DROP CONSTRAINT [FK_Table7_Tabla1] GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Tabla3] DROP CONSTRAINT [FK_Tabla3_Tabla32] GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Tabla3] DROP CONSTRAINT [FK_Tabla3_Tabla3] GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Tabla4] DROP CONSTRAINT [FK_Tabla4_Tabla3] GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Tabla4] DROP CONSTRAINT [FK_Tabla4_Table7] GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Table7] DROP CONSTRAINT [FK_Table7_Tabla3] GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Tabla3] DROP CONSTRAINT [FK_Tabla3_Tabla5] GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Tabla3] DROP CONSTRAINT [FK_Tabla3_Tabla6] GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Tabla1] DROP CONSTRAINT [PK_Tabla1] GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Tabla2] DROP CONSTRAINT [PK_Tabla2] GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Tabla3] DROP CONSTRAINT [PK_Tabla3] GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Tabla4] DROP CONSTRAINT [PK_Tabla4] GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Table7] ADD [ID8] [int] NULL GO CREATE TABLE [dbo].[Tabla8] ( [ID8] [int] NOT NULL, [Descripcion] [varchar] (50) COLLATE Modern_Spanish_CI_AS NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_Tabla8] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [ID8] ASC ) WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY] GO CREATE TABLE [dbo].[TempTabla1] ( [ID] [int] IDENTITY (2,2) NOT NULL, [ID2] [int] NOT NULL, [Descripcion] [varchar] (50) COLLATE Modern_Spanish_CI_AS NOT NULL ) ON [PRIMARY] GO
SET IDENTITY_INSERT [dbo].[TempTabla1] ON INSERT INTO [dbo].[TempTabla1] ([ID],[ID2],[Descripcion]) SELECT [ID],[ID2],[Descripcion] FROM [dbo].[Tabla1] SET IDENTITY_INSERT [dbo].[TempTabla1] OFF GO
DROP TABLE [dbo].[Tabla1] GO EXEC sp_rename N'[dbo].[TempTabla1]',N'Tabla1', 'OBJECT' GO
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[TempTabla2] ( [ID2] [int] IDENTITY (2,2) NOT NULL, [Descripcion] [varchar] (50) COLLATE Modern_Spanish_CI_AS NOT NULL, [ID3] [int] NULL ) ON [PRIMARY] GO
SET IDENTITY_INSERT [dbo].[TempTabla2] ON INSERT INTO [dbo].[TempTabla2] ([ID2],[Descripcion],[ID3]) SELECT [ID2],[Descripcion],[ID3] FROM [dbo].[Tabla2] SET IDENTITY_INSERT [dbo].[TempTabla2] OFF GO
DROP TABLE [dbo].[Tabla2] GO EXEC sp_rename N'[dbo].[TempTabla2]',N'Tabla2', 'OBJECT' GO
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[TempTabla3] ( [ID3] [int] IDENTITY (2,2) NOT NULL, [Descripcion] [varchar] (50) COLLATE Modern_Spanish_CI_AS NOT NULL, [ParentID3] [int] NULL, [ParentParentID3] [int] NULL, [ID5] [int] NULL, [ID6] [int] NULL ) ON [PRIMARY] GO
SET IDENTITY_INSERT [dbo].[TempTabla3] ON INSERT INTO [dbo].[TempTabla3] ([ID3],[Descripcion],[ParentID3],[ParentParentID3],[ID5],[ID6]) SELECT [ID3],[Descripcion],[ParentID3],[ParentParentID3],[ID5],[ID6] FROM [dbo].[Tabla3] SET IDENTITY_INSERT [dbo].[TempTabla3] OFF GO
DROP TABLE [dbo].[Tabla3] GO EXEC sp_rename N'[dbo].[TempTabla3]',N'Tabla3', 'OBJECT' GO
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[TempTabla4] ( [ID4] [int] IDENTITY (1,1) NOT NULL, [ID1] [int] NOT NULL, [ID2] [int] NOT NULL, [ID3] [int] NOT NULL, [ID7] [int] NULL ) ON [PRIMARY] GO
SET IDENTITY_INSERT [dbo].[TempTabla4] ON INSERT INTO [dbo].[TempTabla4] ([ID4],[ID1],[ID2],[ID3],[ID7]) SELECT [ID4],[ID1],[ID2],[ID3],[ID7] FROM [dbo].[Tabla4] SET IDENTITY_INSERT [dbo].[TempTabla4] OFF GO
DROP TABLE [dbo].[Tabla4] GO EXEC sp_rename N'[dbo].[TempTabla4]',N'Tabla4', 'OBJECT' GO
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Tabla2] ADD CONSTRAINT [PK_Tabla2] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [ID2] ASC ) WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Tabla1] ADD CONSTRAINT [PK_Tabla1] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [ID] ASC ) WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Tabla4] ADD CONSTRAINT [PK_Tabla4] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [ID4] ASC ) WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Tabla3] ADD CONSTRAINT [PK_Tabla3] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [ID3] ASC ) WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Tabla4] ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_Tabla4_Tabla2] FOREIGN KEY ( [ID2] ) REFERENCES [dbo].[Tabla2] ( [ID2] ) GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Table7] ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_Table7_Tabla2] FOREIGN KEY ( [ID2] ) REFERENCES [dbo].[Tabla2] ( [ID2] ) GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Tabla5] ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_Tabla5_Tabla6] FOREIGN KEY ( [ID6] ) REFERENCES [dbo].[Tabla6] ( [ID6] ) GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Tabla1] ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_Tabla1_Tabla2] FOREIGN KEY ( [ID2] ) REFERENCES [dbo].[Tabla2] ( [ID2] ) GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Tabla4] ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_Tabla4_Tabla1] FOREIGN KEY ( [ID1] ) REFERENCES [dbo].[Tabla1] ( [ID] ) GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Table7] ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_Table7_Tabla1] FOREIGN KEY ( [ID1] ) REFERENCES [dbo].[Tabla1] ( [ID] ) GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Tabla2] ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_Tabla2_Tabla3] FOREIGN KEY ( [ID3] ) REFERENCES [dbo].[Tabla3] ( [ID3] ) GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Tabla4] ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_Tabla4_Table7] FOREIGN KEY ( [ID7] ) REFERENCES [dbo].[Table7] ( [ID7] ) GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Tabla3] ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_Tabla3_Tabla32] FOREIGN KEY ( [ParentParentID3] ) REFERENCES [dbo].[Tabla3] ( [ID3] ) GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Tabla4] ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_Tabla4_Tabla3] FOREIGN KEY ( [ID3] ) REFERENCES [dbo].[Tabla3] ( [ID3] ) GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Tabla3] ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_Tabla3_Tabla6] FOREIGN KEY ( [ID6] ) REFERENCES [dbo].[Tabla6] ( [ID6] ) GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Tabla3] ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_Tabla3_Tabla5] FOREIGN KEY ( [ID5] ) REFERENCES [dbo].[Tabla5] ( [ID5] ) GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Table7] ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_Table7_Tabla3] FOREIGN KEY ( [ID3] ) REFERENCES [dbo].[Tabla3] ( [ID3] ) GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Tabla3] ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_Tabla3_Tabla3] FOREIGN KEY ( [ParentID3] ) REFERENCES [dbo].[Tabla3] ( [ID3] ) GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Table7] ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_Table7_Tabla8] FOREIGN KEY ( [ID8] ) REFERENCES [dbo].[Tabla8] ( [ID8] ) GO

data.name: TestIndexEnabled
data.value:
USE TestIndexEnabled1 GO
DROP INDEX [IX_Tabla1_2] ON [dbo].[Tabla1] GO ALTER INDEX [IX_Tabla1_1] ON [dbo].[Tabla1] DISABLE GO ALTER INDEX [IX_Tabla1] ON [dbo].[Tabla1] REBUILD GO CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX [IX_Tabla1_2] ON [dbo].[Tabla1] ( [ID] ASC, [Campo1] ASC ) WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] GO CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX [IX3] ON [dbo].[Tabla1] ( [ID] ASC, [Campo1] ASC, [Campo2] ASC ) WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] GO ALTER INDEX [IX3] ON [dbo].[Tabla1] DISABLE GO

data.name: TestIndexSimple
data.value:
USE TestIndexSimple1 GO
DROP INDEX [IX_Tabla1_Includes] ON [dbo].[Tabla1] GO DROP INDEX [IX_Table1_FillFactor] ON [dbo].[Tabla1] GO DROP INDEX [IX_Tabla1] ON [dbo].[Tabla1] GO DROP INDEX [IX_Sort_DB] ON [dbo].[Tabla1] GO CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX [IX DROP] ON [dbo].[Tabla1] ( [ID] ASC, [ID2] ASC, [ID3] ASC, [ID4] ASC ) WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] GO CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX [IX_Tabla1] ON [dbo].[Tabla1] ( [ID2] ASC, [ID3] DESC, [ID4] DESC ) WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] GO CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX [IX_Table1_FillFactor] ON [dbo].[Tabla1] ( [ID] ASC, [ID3] ASC ) WITH (PAD_INDEX = ON, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON, FILLFACTOR = 60) ON [PRIMARY] GO CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX [IX_Tabla1_Includes] ON [dbo].[Tabla1] ( [ID2] ASC ) INCLUDE ([ID]) WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] GO CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX [IX_Sort_DB] ON [dbo].[Tabla1] ( [ID4] ASC ) WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = ON, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = OFF, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = OFF, FILLFACTOR = 100) ON [PRIMARY] GO

data.name: TestIndexuserType
data.value:
USE TestIndexUserType1 GO
DROP INDEX [IX3] ON [dbo].[Tabla1] GO DROP INDEX [IX2] ON [dbo].[Tabla1] GO DROP INDEX [IX1] ON [dbo].[Tabla1] GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Tabla1] ALTER COLUMN [ValorId] [int] NOT NULL GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Tabla1] ALTER COLUMN [Valor2Id] [money] NULL GO DROP TYPE [dbo].[Tipo1] GO CREATE TYPE [dbo].[Tipo1] FROM [int] NOT NULL GO DROP TYPE [dbo].[Tipo2] GO CREATE TYPE [dbo].[Tipo2] FROM [money] NOT NULL GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Tabla1] ALTER COLUMN [ValorId] [Tipo1] NOT NULL GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Tabla1] ALTER COLUMN [Valor2Id] [Tipo2] NULL GO CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX [IX2] ON [dbo].[Tabla1] ( [Valor2Id] ASC ) WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] GO CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX [IX3] ON [dbo].[Tabla1] ( [ValorId] DESC, [Valor2Id] DESC ) WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] GO CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX [IX1] ON [dbo].[Tabla1] ( [ValorId] ASC ) WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] GO

data.name: TestIndexXML
data.value:
USE TestIndexXML1 GO
CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX [IX_Tabla1] ON [dbo].[Tabla1] ( [ID] ASC ) WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] GO CREATE PRIMARY XML INDEX [XML_IX_Tabla1] ON [dbo].[Tabla1] ( [Campo1] ) WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) GO

data.name: TestSynonyms
data.value:
USE TestSinonimos1 GO
DROP SYNONYM [dbo].[Tabla5] GO DROP SYNONYM [dbo].[Tabla2] GO CREATE SYNONYM [dbo].[Tabla4] FOR [TestSinonimos1].[dbo].[Tabla1] GO CREATE SYNONYM [dbo].[Tabla2] FOR [TestSinonimos1].[dbo].[Tabla3] GO

data.name: TestViewSchemaBinding
data.value:
USE TestView1 GO
DROP VIEW [dbo].[Vista1] GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Tabla1] DROP CONSTRAINT [PK_Tabla1] GO CREATE TABLE [dbo].[Tabla2] ( [ID] [int] NOT NULL, [Campo2] [varchar] (50) COLLATE Modern_Spanish_CI_AS NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_Tabla2] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [ID] ASC ) WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY] GO CREATE TABLE [dbo].[TempTabla1] ( [ID] [int] IDENTITY (1,1) NOT NULL, [ID2] [int] NOT NULL, [Valor] [varchar] (50) COLLATE Modern_Spanish_CI_AS NOT NULL, ) ON [PRIMARY] GO
SET IDENTITY_INSERT [dbo].[TempTabla1] ON INSERT INTO [dbo].[TempTabla1] ([ID],[ID2],[Valor]) SELECT [ID],[ID2],[Valor] FROM [dbo].[Tabla1] SET IDENTITY_INSERT [dbo].[TempTabla1] OFF GO
DROP TABLE [dbo].[Tabla1] GO EXEC sp_rename N'[dbo].[TempTabla1]',N'Tabla1', 'OBJECT' GO
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Tabla1] ADD CONSTRAINT [PK_Tabla1] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [ID] ASC ) WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] GO CREATE VIEW [dbo].[Vista1] WITH SCHEMABINDING AS SELECT T1.ID, Valor + 'H' AS Valor, T2.Campo2 FROM dbo.Tabla1 T1 INNER JOIN dbo.Tabla2 T2 ON T2.ID = T1.ID
GO

data.name: TestViewComun
data.value:
USE TestViewComun1 GO
DROP VIEW [dbo].[Vista2] GO DROP VIEW [dbo].[Vista1] GO CREATE VIEW [dbo].[Vista3] AS SELECT 1 AS Test1, 2 AS Test2, 3 AS Test3
GO CREATE VIEW dbo.Vista1 AS SELECT 1 AS Test1, 2 AS Test2 GO

data.name: TestConstraintFKRemove
data.value:
USE TestConstraintFKRemoveTable1 GO
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Child] DROP CONSTRAINT [FK_Child_Parent] GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[ChildChild] DROP CONSTRAINT [FK_ChildChild_Child] GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Child] DROP CONSTRAINT [PK_Child] GO DROP TABLE [dbo].[ChildChild] GO DROP TABLE [dbo].[Parent] GO CREATE TABLE [dbo].[TempChild] ( [ID] [int] IDENTITY (2,2) NOT NULL, [ParentId] [int] NOT NULL, [Campo2] [varchar] (50) COLLATE Modern_Spanish_CI_AS NOT NULL, [Campo3] AS ([Campo2]+'Hola'), ) ON [PRIMARY] GO
SET IDENTITY_INSERT [dbo].[TempChild] ON INSERT INTO [dbo].[TempChild] ([ID],[ParentId],[Campo2]) SELECT [ID],[ParentId],[Campo2] FROM [dbo].[Child] SET IDENTITY_INSERT [dbo].[TempChild] OFF GO
DROP TABLE [dbo].[Child] GO EXEC sp_rename N'[dbo].[TempChild]',N'Child', 'OBJECT' GO
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Child] ADD CONSTRAINT [PK_Child] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [ID] ASC ) WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] GO
